features.name: Yahoo Watchlist API
features.description: Fetches and maps real-time stock data from market_tickers for the EGX watchlist.

features.name: Stock Profile & History API
features.description: Provides detailed company profile from market_tickers and historical OHLC data from ohlc_data.

features.name: Deep Screener API
features.description: Multi-factor filtering for stocks across sectors and valuation ratios.

features.name: Mutual Funds API
features.description: Tracks NAVs, returns, and sector allocations for mutual funds.

features.name: Database Integration Layer
features.description: Asynchronous database access using Supabase and secondary connection pools.
